column4: We had been there in our first meal in Rome....what a great surprise... the decoration is amazing, the food delicious and the staff are very friendly.
Very very kind our comedian host Who brings you the greatest meal and pleasure for the evening . If you are in Rome, please visit Marco (polo) for a smile. Great family restaurant

We were looking for a light quick meal near our hotel. Went into Botticelli. Pleasantly surprised. Ordered a Pasta with pesto, burrata cheese and hazelnuts. Large plate fed two of us. Had a side of Focaccia Bread with it. It was outstanding.

This was my first visit to Rome. Ran across this restaurant from a guy on the sidewalk, it didn‚Äôt disappoint. We were served by Carlo, who provided excellent service and food recommendations!! I would definitely recommend this restaurant with high reviews!!
We went several times for dinner to this excellent restaurant. Good service, nice selection of food and wines.

column3: Why didn't I Listen Run Away
column4: Great Fried Calamari. Everything else was terrible. Got cracked when I ordered the large steak charged me 60 euros. Tourist Trap. No need to say more if you don'!t go I did my job.

Found this restaurant by accident and - wish we had found it earlier. Great food, excellent service. Try it - you will not be disappointed. I wish I was not leaving tomorrow - we would certainly come back
Thank you for a fabulous meal, fettucine with shrimp and tomatoes, delicious. Lovely staff. Go xxxxx

Ordered sea bass, got mackerel. Unlike any other restaurant in Rome, they charged 10% service charge for 2 people without any notice on the menu. Realized afterwards that credit charge was one more euro than the original food bill. Poor service, average food.

A nice quiet place to eat after hearing an evening concert at the nearby Teatro dell Opera. The service was good; the food, tasty; and the prices quite reasonable. The owner and staff were very gracious - they made our visit very special!
Very tasty food, great atmosphere and fantastic staff. Food was very good and very well priced. Staff very friendly. Recommend to anyone visiting Roma.

column3: we enjoyed multiple good meals here
column4: Party of four; all could find new and different options that appealed to them. Tasty food; service was great. The owner is a great salesman; backed up with a good kitchen and staff. We walked here (short walk from St. Regis,) save room for gelato!
I order to deliver and I was expecting an incredible lasagna ! The worst lasagna ever.. it taste like frozen lasagna !
Very long waiting. Really. Long. And not simultaneous first courses for all guests. But tasty. Too expensive.
disgustingly not tasty !!!! inside the restaurant we were waited by a waiter in a jacket, the food was over-cooked, brought by the missing stinky oysters

This place we just happened to walk past. We enjoyed a fabulous meal with risotto and real homemade pasta that tasted delicious. The staff seemed to know their wines and we were recommended one that was absolutely to our liking.

They served me fish but they didn't tell me that fish was 600g. Really ... They cheated me. I really don't recommend this place. The waiter should ask me if I want to order such a fish. An usual portion has 300-350 grams..
Amazing food, good location, so far the best hospitality as the waiters are humble and attentive. I however recommend that you still stick to the food in the menu to enjoy better

The food was not cooked I call the waitress please change this dish after 30 minis he take my food was over cokked I told him but they cannot hair me what kinds of services is it‚Äôs very disappointing.
I had lovely dinner on Sunday.I would highly recommend to visit this restaurant if you would like fresh pasta! :-) And if you like Art/ Boutique style -this is the place to go.

Not much to be said about this restaurant. Good position with a small terrace in front. Service is average, food the same. Not to pricy. Inside environment is nice and pleasant. All together it can be a safe choice if you are not demanding.

column3: Nice food. Wine a bit pricey and service is automatically included
column4: The food was ok, tasty, served quickly - but the restaurant was quite empty. Service had automatically been added to the bill, which I don‚Äôt like. But otherwise, not a bad meal and not a bad price.

column3: Terrible - don‚Äôt get sucked in by the host
column4: We made the mistake of being sucked in by the host. Don‚Äôt make the same mistake. Bad food and flat beer. Our waitress actually made fun of us to the table next to us for not getting dessert. Huge tourist trap.

Met mauro on the street and came back for dinner later with some friends. Super friendly and the hospitality was just insane the food tasted great and we got a group photo after. Great addition to the Rome trip
The food was great and priced right. Mauro saw me walking down the street and he spoke English. He was very nice

column3: Fresh Pasta, Beat Caccio e peppe
column4: The service both visits, on a Sunday the first and the second one a Tuesday the Caccio e Peppe was a bold statement, loved it, the house wine great plus a little heads up on Puglia (not visited yet, but seems a good idea)
Great seabass with potatoes,antipasto to kill, and a great brunello, decor is amazing a combo of art and great Italian food with great service time average being all fresh...
IL BOTTICELLI, is a really good restaurant, food is great and it‚Äôs family friendly! The best four chese pizza in Rome
Not recommended to come with a group with limited budgets, however still very nice service, nice interiors and decent food!

column3: Nice Restaurant just off Via Nazionale
column4: Had a nice meal here during our stay in Rome. The owner Mauro made us feel v welcome and was very chatty (speaks perfect English as he lived in Canada for some time). Highlight was the Sea Bream which was excellent. Would recommend.
Worth a visit but don‚Äôt eat. This place is absolute bedlam. Good for a drink and a laugh at Manuel‚Äôs expense.
Food was really good and service was so much better than that received in most of Rome... Well worth a visit.
Very very nice food, Mauro Del Matto on front very friendly and also informative on the area. Would highly recommend
Everything was perfect, the dishes were amazing, delicious and marina and Marco were fantastic and friendly! Highly recomented

We ate here twice in October. The food was appetising and reasonably priced. The service was a bit haphazard - we did see some people left waiting some time and a shared platter delivered to the wrong table then swiftly whisked away! Friendly staff.
The restaurant itself was ok, food was average and average priced. Waiters were friendly. Has free WiFi which you have to go through multiple login screens to access. Ok to stumble across.
I LOVE the food and the quite and staff of this resturant. I especially love Mauro! Only reason I will come to this restaurant. Thanks!!
I LOVE the food and the ambiance of this restaurant. I especially love Mauro! Only reason I will come to this restaurant, plus, the awesome Italian food!
Stopped in for breakfast ad was very disappointed. The food was terrible, service very slow and the rest was not clean.

We ordered sparkling water for my husband and still water for me and our daughter. The sparkling was delivered and the still water was never delivered. Pasta was tasty but small portions. No offers of drinks or desserts...terrible service.
Amazing food with wonderful service. Erta was wonderful! The prices were reasonable and the speed was acceptable! Great location from the Main Street!
Service was average, food was poor. I like al Dante pasta, this was very undercooked. I had to wait for the bill after asking for it 3 times.

column3: Outside seating. Good service and food.
column4: We went there after a long day of touring. The food was good and the service very attentive. It was great to sit outside and enjoy a drink and a pizza/pasta.

A little too "Euro" shek for me but the staff was very friendly and attentive. We ordered a bottle of wine a few small plates of cheese etc. Out door seating is a little awkward since it's almost in an alley.

Staff members were very kind and knowledgeable about the menu. Order a Botticelli Cheeseburger that could feed two people and a glass of wine. Nice lunch spot for anyone staying around the Republique. Cheers!
tasty! with a lot of variety. open and beuty space that gives you a relaxed atmosphere. very clean and welcoming staff. ate there pizza & pasta, and enjoy it. thanks :)
Spent afternoon snack with friends. We ordered pizza and pasta. I loved the pizza. pasta is okay. but the ambiance was remarkable and very al fresco we enjoyed three good hours chatting while eating.
Very good dinner and reasonable prices, waitresses very kind, We've been there three different times and always very good!
Great food and service good choice of wine. heaters for outside dinning. Anna our waitress was lively and fun a great asset to the restaurant
I can not have a comprehensive proposal for this restaurant. All I can say is that we got two pizzas and were very poor. The interior is quite nice.

Any resemblance to Italian cooking was purely coincidental. Caesar Saldana made with mayo. No anchovies. Mozzarella rubbery. Tuna I ordered was unrecognizable as any kind of fish. This was the worst dining experience I have ever had in italy.

Service was good and friendly. There was enough assortments of meals. I'll take pasta and my husband take cesar salad. Portion were big and sufficient. Taste was wery good. Best pasta I have ever eaten.

Poorly tasting food, service ok but overpriced tasteless food. Avoid if possible. Meal was huge but the burger I had was worse than anything I have had at a fast food place. My husband had spaghetti and meatballs that was tasteless
We ate there one evening great food full of flavour reasonably priced with great service i would recommend
The waitresses are serving with smiles and joy. Food are delicious. Prices are average, not expensive but not cheap. Good value for money.
Above average food at a reasonable price. Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful and had a good knowledge of English.
An interesting dining experience . Not for the shy type. Service was full on and food was excellent.
Visited twice last week Aug 2016, staff excellent food great and prices OK. Fully air conditioned and reasonably cool outside.
We went to this restaurant twice on this vacation. The food was good and the service was excellent. Our server was Anna. She was wonderful

Enjoyed a decent dinner. Mozzarella and tomato to start was really good. Meatball spaghetti was yummy; shame they couldn't do a mixed salad even though they had all the ingredients! Anna, as outside waitress, was fab. Il conto was average for the area.
Friendly energetic staff. Good service. The food was good but not great. They seem to have an aversion to air conditioning. Sweating during a meal is not top of my list. Live entertainment was good,

We were just passing and this place was down a side street, so we thought we would give it a go. We had lunch here and all ordered something different, food was good and service very efficient. We sat outside.
Lovely little restaurant, recently opened and building a good trade. Had a lovely meal on both occasions we ate there. Atmosphere was great with Alex keeping us all amused!
Alex our server could not do enough for us & he was so charming and funny. He also makes the best Mojito ever! Thank you!
